we need to ensure this functonality in the course class
Course Class The Course class should manage the overall structure and details of a course, including the students, assessments, and relevant metadata.
Functionality:
Store Course Information: Course Details: Store details such as course name, description, and any other relevant metadata. Manage Students: Add Student: Method to add a student to the course. Remove Student: Method to remove a student from the course. Retrieve Students: Method to retrieve a list of all students enrolled in the course. Manage Assessments: Add Assessment: Method to add an assessment to the course. Remove Assessment: Method to remove an assessment from the course. Retrieve Assessments: Method to retrieve a list of all assessments in the course. Tracking and Reporting: Calculate Course Statistics: Methods to calculate overall course statistics such as average grade, pass rate, etc. Generate Reports: Methods to generate reports on course performance and student progress.
and this functionality in the assessment class
Assessment Class The Assessment class should handle the details and structure of assessments within a course, including tasks, outcomes, and grading criteria.
Functionality:
Store Assessment Details: Assessment Details: Store details such as name, weight, max score, and description. Manage Tasks: Add Task: Method to add a task to the assessment. Remove Task: Method to remove a task from the assessment. Retrieve Tasks: Method to retrieve a list of all tasks associated with the assessment. Manage Outcomes: Add Outcome: Method to link an outcome to the assessment. Remove Outcome: Method to remove an outcome from the assessment. Retrieve Outcomes: Method to retrieve a list of all outcomes linked to the assessment. Grading and Rubrics: Set Rubrics: Methods to set and retrieve rubrics for the assessment. Reporting: Generate Assessment Report: Methods to generate detailed reports on assessment performance.
